refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: The cx:markup-blitz step performs Invisible XML processing per . It transforms a non-XML input into XML by applying the specified Invisible XML grammar.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The cx:markup-blitz step performs Invisible XML parsing with Gunther Rademacherâ€™s Markup Blitz.
This step is the same as the p:invisible-xml step, but it always uses the Markup Blitz processor. It is also possible to configure XML Calabash to use Markup Blitz for the p:invisible-xml step.
